EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Mobile First World_Q414.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: It’s a Mobile First World: Faster Mobile Apps with Pivotal and VMware 12/3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
A friendly reminder of your registration for our upcoming webinar "It’s a Mobile First World: Faster Mobile Apps with Pivotal and VMware " on Wednesday, December 3, 2014 at 10:00 AM PST. Please see the event details below:
Date: Wednesday, December 3, 2014 Time: 10:00AM PST (San Francisco) Event Number: 668 800 780 Join the Webex <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?d=668800780&t=a> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- US TOLL FREE: 1-855-749-4750 - Global call-in numbers <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=33226853&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 668 800 780
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us, The Pivotal Team
